data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Amravati, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Amravati, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Amravati, Maharashtra, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 31,772 believers in Amravati against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, teach the 31,772 believers in Amravati that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Dandigan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please help the 31,772 believers in the county of Amravati to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, help 577 new simple churches start among the 2,888,400 people in the county of Amravati, Maharashtra, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the county of Amravati, Maharashtra, India has a population of 2,888,400.

We estimate Amravati has 31,772 people who might know Jesus, 35,046 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,821,582 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Amravati access to a Bible in their own language.
